Welcome to my research website. My work focuses on the psychological aspects of health and behavior. This site provides an overview of my publications, projects, and other professional activities.

## About Me

I am a health psychologist specializing in behavioral change and motivation. My research interests include:

* Health behavior
* Stress and coping
* Digital health interventions 

## Latest News

* **July 2025:** Our new paper on digital health interventions was published in the *Journal of Health Psychology*.
* **June 2025:** I gave a talk at the international conference on a new model of stress management.

You can find more information about my work on the Research page.
